title: user login with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login endpoint to verify that a user can successfully log in with valid username and password, receiving a JWT token and user details including role and permissions.

title: get current user information with valid token
description: Test the /api/auth/me endpoint to ensure it returns the current authenticated user's information when provided with a valid JWT token, and returns 401 Unauthorized if the token is missing or invalid.

title: create new product with required fields
description: Test the POST /api/products endpoint to create a new product with required fields such as name, and verify the product is created successfully with a 201 response.

title: update product stock quantity
description: Test the PATCH /api/products/{id}/stock endpoint to update the stock quantity of a specific product and verify the stock is updated correctly with a 200 response.

title: get all customers with purchase history
description: Test the GET /api/customers endpoint to retrieve a list of all customers along with their purchase history, verifying the response contains customer details and associated invoices.

title: create a sales invoice with line items
description: Test the POST /api/invoices endpoint to create a new sales invoice including line items for sold products, and verify the invoice is created successfully with a 201 response.

title: create purchase invoice and update stock
description: Test the POST /api/purchases endpoint to create a purchase invoice and verify that the product stock quantities are automatically updated accordingly, with a 201 response.

title: create an expense with category
description: Test the POST /api/expenses endpoint to create a new expense record with a category, and verify the expense is created successfully with a 201 response.

title: get all suppliers list
description: Test the GET /api/suppliers endpoint to retrieve a list of all suppliers, verifying the response contains supplier details with a 200 status.

title: get all roles with permissions
description: Test the GET /api/roles endpoint to retrieve all roles along with their assigned permissions, verifying the response contains role details and permissions with a 200 status.
